verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the tax collectors <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> were coming <S%G2258><s%> close <S%G1448><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> murmured, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3754><s%> "This man <S%G3778><s%> welcomes <S%G4327><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> eats <S%G4906><s%> with them. <S%G846><s%>"
He told <S%G2036><s%> them <S%G846><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable. <S%G3850><s%>

"Which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> if you had <S%G2192><s%> one hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lost <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2641><s%> wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> the ninety-nine <S%G1768><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> the one that <S%G3588><s%> was lost, <S%G622><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>
When <S%G2532><s%> he has found <S%G2147><s%> it, <S%G2007><s%> he carries it on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> shoulders, <S%G5606><s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> <S%G1519><s%> home, <S%G3624><s%> he calls together <S%G4779><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4796><s%> 'Rejoice with me, <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was lost! <S%G622><s%>'

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> there will be <S%G2071><s%> more joy <S%G5479><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> repents, <S%G2228><s%> than over <S%G1909><s%> ninety-nine <S%G1768><s%> righteous people <S%G1342><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> she had <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> drachma coins, <S%G1406><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> she lost <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> drachma coin, <S%G1406><s%> <S%G681><s%> wouldn't <S%G3780><s%> light <S%G681><s%> a lamp, <S%G3088><s%> sweep <S%G4563><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> diligently <S%G1960><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> she found it? <S%G2147><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> she has found <S%G2147><s%> it, <S%G4779><s%> she calls together <S%G4779><s%> her friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4796><s%> 'Rejoice with me, <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> the drachma <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost. <S%G622><s%>'

Even so, <S%G3779><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> there is <S%G1096><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence of <S%G1799><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner repenting. <S%G268><s%>"
He <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons. <S%G5207><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> younger <S%G3501><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> his father, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3962><s%> 'Father, give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> my <S%G1911><s%> share <S%G3313><s%> of your property. <S%G3776><s%>' He <S%G2532><s%> divided <S%G1244><s%> his livelihood <S%G979><s%> between them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after, <S%G3326><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G537><s%> of this together <S%G4863><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> traveled <S%G589><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country. <S%G5561><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> he wasted <S%G1287><s%> his <S%G846><s%> property <S%G3776><s%> with riotous <S%G811><s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had spent <S%G1159><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of it, <S%G1096><s%> there arose a severe <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> country, <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be in need. <S%G5302><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and joined himself <S%G2853><s%> to <S%G1520><s%> one of the citizens <S%G4177><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> country, <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> pigs. <S%G5519><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> wanted <S%G1937><s%> to fill <S%G1072><s%> his <S%G846><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the husks <S%G2769><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> the pigs <S%G5519><s%> ate, <S%G2068><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him any. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G4214><s%> 'How many hired servants <S%G3407><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>'s have bread <S%G740><s%> enough to spare, <S%G4052><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>'m dying <S%G622><s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

I will get up <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will tell <S%G2046><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in your <S%G4675><s%> sight. <S%G1799><s%>

I <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> hired servants. <S%G3407><s%>"'

"He <S%G2532><s%> arose, <S%G450><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G568><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> far off, <S%G3112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was moved with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ran, <S%G5143><s%> and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> neck, <S%G5137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kissed <S%G2705><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3962><s%> 'Father, I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1799><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> sight. <S%G1799><s%> I <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no longer <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>'

"But <S%G1161><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> <S%G1627><s%> 'Bring out the best <S%G4413><s%> robe, <S%G4749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1746><s%> it on <S%G1746><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G1325><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet. <S%G4228><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> kill <S%G2380><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and let us eat, <S%G5315><s%> and celebrate; <S%G2532><s%>

for <S%G3778><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again. <S%G2532><s%> He was <S%G2258><s%> lost, <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is found. <S%G2147><s%>' They <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to celebrate. <S%G2165><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field. <S%G68><s%> <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to the house, <S%G3614><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> music <S%G4858><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dancing. <S%G5525><s%>
He <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the servants <S%G3816><s%> to him, <S%G4441><s%> and asked <S%G846><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was going <S%G5023><s%> on. <S%G1498><s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G4675><s%> 'Your brother <S%G80><s%> has come, <S%G2240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> has killed <S%G2380><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has received <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> back safe and healthy. <S%G5198><s%>'

But <S%G1161><s%> he was angry, <S%G3710><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> go in. <S%G1525><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out, <S%G1831><s%> and begged <S%G3870><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> his father, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G99999><s%> 'Behold, these many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I <S%G3928><s%> have served <S%G1398><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G3928><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> disobeyed a commandment <S%G1785><s%> of yours, <S%G4675><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G1325><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> a goat, <S%G2056><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might celebrate <S%G2165><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> friends. <S%G5384><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has devoured <S%G2719><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> living <S%G979><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> prostitutes, <S%G4204><s%> you killed <S%G2380><s%> the fattened <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%> for him. <S%G846><s%>'

"He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5043><s%> 'Son, you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that is mine <S%G2076><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> yours. <S%G4674><s%>

But it was appropriate <S%G1163><s%> to celebrate <S%G2165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be glad, <S%G2165><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again. <S%G326><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> lost, <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is found. <S%G2147><s%>'"
